home.subtitle: Electrical Engineering Student | Embedded Systems Enthusiast

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate student in embedded systems, electronics, and signal processing. I'm driven by curiosity and a desire to build impactful things.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: In 2024, I completed an internship at Num’axes, a French company specializing in the development of electronic devices for animals. My main mission was to design and prototype a printed circuit board (PCB) for an anti-bark dog collar, integrating both analog and digital components.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.list: Reading, Cooking, Jogging, Digital & Traditional Arts, Playing Guitar
